New Records: Reed Sheppard scored a career-high 12 points against the Chicago Bulls
Key Match Events: Reed Sheppard made his first basket late in the third period with a 25-footer off a kick-out pass from Jock Landale
Sheppard stuffed Talen Horton-Tucker's shot near the rim in the fourth quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Reed Sheppard's scoring surge in the fourth quarter gave him a new career-high, bouncing back from a zero-point performance in the previous game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Houston Rockets won the game 108-75, leading by 68-52 at halftime
Others: Reed Sheppard had three 3-pointers in the fourth quarter
He had 12 points, 2 rebounds, 1 assist, 3 blocks, 1 turnover, 4-7 FG, 4-5 3-PT FG, 0-0 FT
